abstract: Rising generation of professional chefs are grilling with fire and smoke to transform anything--from fish heads to ramen noodles--into taste sensation; recipes for glazed grilled carrots and grilled arctic char with horseradish crema offered.

headline.main: Grill Like the Chefs: Throw Everything Onto the Fire

snippet: The experts know that a fire means more than burgers. Try grilling avocados, carrots, even fish heads.
lead_paragraph: The experts know that a fire means more than burgers. Try grilling avocados, carrots, even fish heads.
